sentence.Network_en: Architectures, Buildings and Arts are the Crown Jewels of Mankind.
sentence.Network_cn: 艺术与建筑等都是人类皇冠上的宝石.

sentence.Network_en: The pearls and jewels of 30000 pounds value is robbed.
sentence.Network_cn: 价值三万英镑的珠宝被盗.

sentence.Network_en: A king would have liked it best among all the jewels of his kingdom.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个国王会在他王国里所有的珍宝中最喜欢它.
